item.title: About Me
item.description: I am Qingcheng Zhao, a Computer Science student at ShanghaiTech University. I am interested in Machine Learning, and Computer Graphics. I am currently having an internship at Deemos, working on the most advanced DigitalHuman and 3D face reconstruction technology. Experience DJI Technology Co., Ltd. (Jun. 2022 - Nov. 2022) Development Engineer (Internship) Built a Qt application interacting with Drones through ADB (Android Debug Bridg) that could collect, analyze and visualize data from Drones.
